Html:
Hi,
I can see that SQLite is on the todolist, but when realistically will it arrive?

Is it just a matter of writing SqliteProvider.cs, or is there more to it?

thanks

John

Hi John, how fast do you need it? Do you use SqlLite today, if so what provider do you use to connect to it?

Yes, it's just to create a SqlLiteProvider and maybe make some adjustments to the generated sql for the insert, update and delete builders.

 

Regards,

Lars-Erik Kindblad

Support for SqlLite has been added. A beta release is available on http://fluentdata.codeplex.com/releases/view/90977

I will be on holiday for the next 2 weeks but after that I will make a stable release plus add some more information to the documentation.
